verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> one be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, <S%H5307>lying<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and it be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H5221>slain<s%> him:

Then thy <S%H2205>elders<s%> and thy <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and they shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> him that is slain: <S%H2491><s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H386>rough<s%> <S%H5158>valley,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5647>eared<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and shall strike <S%H6203>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5697>heifer's<s%> <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the valley: <S%H5158><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall come <S%H5066>near;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> them the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H5921>by<s%> their <S%H6310>word<s%> shall <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7379>controversy<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5061>stroke<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> tried:

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> that are <S%H7138>next<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> man, shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H6202>beheaded<s%> in the valley: <S%H5158><s%>

And they shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> it.

Be <S%H3722>merciful,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H7130>charge.<s%> And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H3722>forgiven<s%> them.

So shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> put <S%H1197>away<s%> the guilt of <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H3588>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou goest <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into thine <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and thou hast <S%H7617>taken<s%> them <S%H7628>captive,<s%>

And <S%H7200>seest<s%> among the <S%H7633>captives<s%> a <S%H3033>beautiful<s%> <S%H8389><s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and hast a <S%H2836>desire<s%> unto her, that thou wouldest <S%H3947>have<s%> her to thy <S%H802>wife;<s%>

Then thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H8432>home<s%> to thine <S%H1004>house;<s%> and she shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6213>pare<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6856>nails;<s%>

And she shall <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8071>raiment<s%> of her <S%H7628>captivity<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her, and shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1058>bewail<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> and her <S%H517>mother<s%> a <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H3391>month:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> thou shalt go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, and be her <S%H1167>husband,<s%> and she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou have no <S%H2654>delight<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in her, then thou shalt let her <S%H7971>go<s%> whither she <S%H5315>will;<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> sell her at <S%H4376>all<s%> <S%H4376><s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> make <S%H6014>merchandise<s%> of her, <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her.

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H157>beloved,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H8130>hated,<s%> and they have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H1121>children,<s%> both the <S%H157>beloved<s%> and the <S%H8130>hated;<s%> and if the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> hers that was hated: <S%H8146><s%>

Then it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H853>maketh<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1961>hath,<s%> that he <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1069>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H157>beloved<s%> <S%H1069>firstborn<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated,<s%> which is indeed the firstborn: <S%H1060><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> he shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H853><s%> for the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him a <S%H8147>double<s%> <S%H6310>portion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H4672>hath:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H202>strength;<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> is his.

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> which will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and that, when they have <S%H3256>chastened<s%> him, will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them:

Then shall his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on him, and bring him <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H4725>place;<s%>

And they shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> our <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> he will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> our <S%H6963>voice;<s%> he is a <S%H2151>glutton,<s%> and a <S%H5433>drunkard.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die:<s%> so shalt thou put evil <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you; and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H1961>committed<s%> a <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> and he be to be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and thou <S%H8518>hang<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> a tree: <S%H6086><s%>

His <S%H5038>body<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> remain all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thou shalt in any wise <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H6912><s%> him <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> he that is <S%H8518>hanged<s%> is <S%H7045>accursed<s%> of <S%H430>God;)<s%> <S%H853>that<s%> thy <S%H127>land<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
